sentences.en: A naturally or artificially produced radioactive isotope of an element.
sentences.cn: 氯的一种放射性同位素.

sentences.en: A radioactive, inert, gaseous isotope of radon a half - life of 3.92 seconds.
sentences.cn: 氡的一种放射性的, 惰性的和气态的同位素,其半衰期为3.92秒.

sentences.en: Changes of nuclear mass and nuclear size cause isotope shifts.
sentences.cn: 原子核质量和大小的不同引起同位素移动.

sentences.en: In order to differentiate between isotope, a new system of symbol writing had to be developed.
sentences.cn: 为了区分同位素, 不得不制定新的符号书写体系.

sentences.en: Isotope tracing technology was used on animal experiment since 1920 s.
sentences.cn: 同位素示踪技术是20世纪20年代开始用于动物试验.

sentences.en: Lasers promise to change this by making isotope separation easier, and cheaper.
sentences.cn: 激光可以改变这种局面,从而使同位素分离变得比较容易 、 比较廉价一些.

sentences.en: Simmons : Get me a sample and some isotope readings.
sentences.cn: 弄些样本和同位素读数.

sentences.en: The isotope does occur in nature but only extremely rarely.
sentences.cn: 钋的同位素在自然界中的确存在,但是相当罕见.

sentences.en: The isotope ratio is directly used for comparing oils or gases.
sentences.cn: 同位素比率直接用于比较各种石油或天然气.

sentences.en: The maintenance experinence of old MAT isotope mass spectrometer has been discussed.
sentences.cn: 本文讨论了MAT同位素质谱计后期维护中的一些问题.

sentences.en: The Minnesota work on kaersutite also showed the presence of the isotope neon - 21.
sentences.cn: 明尼苏达大学关于钛角闪石的研究表明,其中也存在同位素氖 - 21.

sentences.en: There are differences between natural and adulterated juices in stable isotope ratio.
sentences.cn: 天然果汁与掺假果汁之间在稳定同位素比率方面存在着差异.

sentences.en: There are several ways to separate excited from unexcited molecules, thus harvesting the desired isotope.
sentences.cn: 目前有几种方法可以把受激发分子同未受激发分子分离开, 这样,就可以大量得到我们所需要的同位素了.

sentences.en: This indium isotope was created at the same time as the earth.
sentences.cn: 这种铟同位素与地球产生在同一时代.

sentences.en: Today, most cyclotrons are used either for instructional purpose or for isotope production.
sentences.cn: 今天大多数回旋加速器是用在教学上,或者用于同位素生产.
